dmca.title: DMCA / Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jayce @Bresso.com [mailto:jayce@bresso.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 12, 2007 3:02 AM
To: zzzzzz
Subject: DMCA / Copyright Violation
Importance: High

 

For:
Andrea Z. Almeida
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207


Dear Andrea Z Almeida,

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on 
http://www.bresso.com/audio-formats.shtml
http://www.bresso.com/cd-to-mp3-makers.shtml
http://www.bresso.com/connect-computer-to-stereo.shtml
http://www.bresso.com/wav-to-mp3.shtml
http://www.bresso.com/mp3-bitrate.shtml
http://www.bresso.com/id3-tag.shtml


Infringing Web Pages: 
http://www.mp3klite.com/glossary-audioformats.php
<http://mp3klite.com/glossary-audioformats.php> 
http://www.mp3klite.com/glossary-cdtomp3.php

http://www.mp3klite.com/tutorials-connectcomptostereo.php

http://www.mp3klite.com/glossary-mp3bitrate.php
http://www.mp3klite.com/glossary-id3tag.php



My Contact Information: JAYCE@BRESSO.COM

Infringer's Contact Information: 
 DomainsByProxy.com - 15111 N. Hayden Rd., Ste 160, PMB 353 -
Scottsdale, Arizona 85260 -  United States (480) 624-2599   Fax -- (480)
624-2599 - site MP3KLITE.COM - located on IP  69.56.196.222 - email
mp3klite@domainsbyproxy.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

Gregory Moine

GREGORY MOINE, OWNER
BRESSO.COM
Phone: 1 514 680 8548
Email: JAYCE@BRESSO.COM
